entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
